因為其他強隊會直接買一線球員，而利鐘意買二三線希望佢進化變一線。就算球隊踢得好既時候，好多時係靠夾硬谷120%狀態，問題係正常球員唔會長期狀態高峰，尤其二三線球員。呢個就係擁有一線球員既重要性，勁人之所以勁係因為即使狀態唔係十足仍可以靠經驗、質素幫球隊贏波。另外，二線球員同幼幼如果同一線勁人練得多波，進步都會快啲。

因為其他強隊會直接買一線球員，而利鐘意買二三線希望佢進化變一線。就算球隊踢得好既時候，好多時係靠夾硬谷120%狀態，問題係正常球員唔會長期狀態高峰，尤其二三線球員。呢個就係擁有一線球員既重要性，勁人之所以勁係因為即使狀態唔係十足仍可以靠經驗、質素幫球隊贏波。另外，二線球員同幼幼如果同一線勁人練得多波，進步都會快啲。

Gary Neville: "Over the last 2-3 months teams that sit back against Liverpool make it very difficult for them are their Achilles heel."

Neville: "They can't beat lesser teams at home. Teams that come out against them are OK, they play combinations & are quick on the break."

Gary Neville: "People talk about 'do Liverpool need a Plan B?' Maybe actually improving on Plan A is something they've stopped doing."

Neville: "Me & Carragher could have played as centre backs in that game for Southampton because they weren't shifted anywhere near enough."

Neville: "The nature of Liverpool, they will always come up against inferior teams who will defend deep. They have got to do Plan A better."

Neville: "They have stopped making those little corner runs, those positions where they show & pinging people in on the edge of the box."

Neville: "They play the likes of Firmino, Origi, Sturridge, whoever it might be, they've got to get them making those runs again."

Neville: "Because when they don't they become static, safe and predictable and for me that's the problem at the moment."
